siteMetadata.title: Serpe Boyer
siteMetadata.description: Serpe Boyer's portfolio site using Brevifolia as a starter theme

infoData.belowcontact: Aside from designing product experiences, I love canoeing, cats, and cycling.
infoData.cta: If you’re interested in working with me or just want to chat, feel free to contact me!
infoData.description:
I’m glad you’re here.

I’m a Product, UX Designer from Turkey living in New York. My goal is to create products and experiences that I’m proud of while having a positive and meaningful impact on the people I work with and design for.

I'm currently designing for investing customers at JP Morgan Chase and pursuing my MS in Information Systems at Drexel University.
